sourceDesc.p: No printed source: created as electronic file

encodingDesc.editorialDecl: XML created by Sam van Schaik in April 2008 based on a text file created by Andrew Glass.

head.p: This is a list of links from manuscripts in the British Library Stein collection to the editions at the Early Buddhist Manuscripts Project (EBMP) website:http://www.ebmp.org
